fulltext:
69/48 Nguyễn Gia Trí 
Phường 25, Quận Bình Thạnh, Hồ Chí Minh 
(+84) 944131086 
ducmanh86@gmail.com 
TRẦN ĐỨC MẠNH
CAREER OBJECTIVES 
Leverage the power of technology to build scalable, robust, secure and widely 
adopted products. 
EXPERIENCE 
VRED, Ho Chi Minh — Tech Lead 
AUG 2018 - PRESENT 
●
VRED is a Vietnam e-commerce platform www.vred.vn, www.vaylaithap.vn 
●
Build and lead a team with 7 members: 2 full-stack, 1 backend, 1 
frontend, 1 mobile, 1 tester and 1 devops. 
●
Apply Scrum/Agile project development to ensure deliver products on time 
●
Responsible for making technical decisions and research the latest 
technology trends 
●
Integrate with various third-party providers such as Giao Hang Tiet Kiem, 
ZaloPay, Momo,... 
●
Build satellite pages such as Support, Blog, News based on Wordpress for 
fast deployment and suitable for such CMS-like pages. 
●
Stacks: NodeJS/ReactJS/React Native, RESTful, RabbitMQ, AWS, Nginx, 
PostgreSQL/MongoDB/Redis... 
ShareRing, Ho Chi Minh — Tech Lead 
NOVEMBER 2017 - AUGUST 2018 
●
ShareRing is an Australian company with a focus on Blockchain technology 
●
Lead Backend team to build platforms from scratch which connect and 
interact with Blockchain 
●
Contribute to building a team from the beginning 
●
Stacks: Python, NodeJS, ReactJS, GraphQL, RESTful, ActiveMQ, AWS, Nginx, 
MongoDB, Redis, Blockchain(Ethereum/Tendermint) 
Flix Viet Jsc, Ho Chi Minh — Fullstack developer 
OCTOBER 2016 - OCTOBER 2017 
●
Rebuild and optimize a smartTV app on Tizen(SamSung TV) and WebOS(LG TV). 
Reduce startup time from 15 seconds to 2 seconds on weak-computing and 
low-resource devices following NetFlix technical tips and tricks. 
●
Contribute to building RESTful API server using Django framework which 
can handle 100K requests/seconds at peak time. 
●
Stacks: Python, NodeJS, AngularJS, AWS.  
MASE Hub, Hanoi — Tech Lead 
OCTOBER 2014 - OCTOBER 2016 
●
Lead a development team in an outsourcing company.  
●
Stacks: Python, NodeJS, Javascript.  
Tinh Van Group, Hanoi — Web developer 
FEBRUARY 2012 - SEPTEMBER 2014 
●
Project: Classbook System 
●
Stacks: Python, Android, Javascript, Cordova.  
Ex-Artisan Company, Hanoi — Mobile developer 
SEPTEMBER 2010 - JANUARY 2012 
●
A Japanese outsourcing company in mobile development. 
●
Stacks: Android, iOS.  
EDUCATION 
Thang Long University, Hanoi — Bachelor  
2005 - 2010 
Major in Information System 
CERTIFICATES 
Pragmatic Scrum certificate - https://hocvienagile.com 
HOBBIES 
Making new friends 
Hanging out with my family and friends. 
Listening to music, martial art, reading novels.  
Love travelling, especially trekking, and sports.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
